TravelBox.title: MIX TRAVEL BOX
TravelBox.text: 2 Wild Zaatar, 2 Jebneh & 2 Zaatar Manakeesh.Instructions on the safe handling of the travel box are available on the package.Ingredients are listed on the box itself for airport customs.
